attributes.action: Commit to tackling low birth weight inequality and review the nurse/baby ratio.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Look at more ways of supporting young mothers by increasing support during pregnancy and in particular giving greater attention to health needs during pregnancy.
Further, to ensure that neonatal nurses are able to give optimum care to the babies in the neonatal unit by reviewing the nurse /baby ratio.
